verses.roman:
hena-kāle sei mahārāṣṭrīya brāhmaṇa
sabhāte kahila sei śloka-vivaraṇa

synonyms: hena-kāle—at this time; sei—that; mahārāṣṭrīya brāhmaṇa—the brāhmaṇa of Mahārāṣṭra province; sabhāte—in the meeting; kahila—declared; sei—that; śloka-vivaraṇa—the description of the ātmārāma-śloka explained by Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: At this time the brāhmaṇa from the province of Mahārāṣṭra mentioned Lord Caitanya's explanation of the ātmārāma verse.
